headline.print_headline: Ebola Lapses Persisted for Days at Dallas Hospital
headline.main: Ebola Lapses Persisted for Days at Dallas Hospital

lead_paragraph: Just minutes after Thomas Eric Duncan arrived for a second time at the emergency room, the word is on his chart: "Ebola." But despite all the warnings that the deadly virus could arrive unannounced at an American hospital, for days after the admission, his caregivers are vulnerable.
